SEARCH
Package geometries

Class Plane

java.lang.Object
geometries.Plane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Geometry, Intersectable
public class Plane extends Object implements Geometry
Represents a plane in 3D space.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Plane (Point p1, Point p2, Point p3)
    Constructs a plane from three points on the plane.
    Plane (Point q, Vector normal)
    Constructs a plane from a point on the plane and its normal vector.

    • findIntersections

      public List<Point> findIntersections (Ray ray)
      Description copied from interface: Intersectable
      Finds the intersection points of the specified ray with the geometric shape.
      Specified by:
      findIntersections in interface Intersectable
      Parameters:
      ray - the ray to check for intersections with the geometric shape
      Returns:
      a list of points where the ray intersects the geometric shape, or an empty list if there are no intersections
